__e: Darren and I used to walk home from track practice every day after school, but I didn't get dragged into this mess because the one day that I didn't walk back home-- that was the day that everything happened.
But when Jack's dad sided with Darren and not Jack, Jack's war just got personal.
It's important because this is our last known sighting of Darren and at the moment, as far as we're aware, you're the last person who saw him alive.
